---
category: news
title: "Neural network aided approximation and parameter inference of non-Markovian models of gene expression"
excerpt: "Cells are complex systems that make decisions biologists struggle to understand. Here, the authors use neural networks to approximate the solution of mathematical models that capture the history and randomness of biochemical processes in order to understand the principles of transcription control."
